imdb.plot outline: The epic saga of the real Grizzly Adams is explored in this profound study of a man who abandoned his life as a Boston shoe cobbler to participate in the Great California Gold Rush. After becoming disgusted with the new state of California's greed-driven society, he embarks on an incredible journey that leaves historians recalling him as California's "greatest mountain-man ever."
imdb.title: The Frontier Legend of Grizzly Adams
akas: The Frontier Legend of Grizzly Adams (United States)
plot: The epic saga of the real Grizzly Adams is explored in this profound study of a man who abandoned his life as a Boston shoe cobbler to participate in the Great California Gold Rush. After becoming disgusted with the new state of California's greed-driven society, he embarks on an incredible journey that leaves historians recalling him as California's "greatest mountain-man ever."::Tod Swindell
